abstract: An image of the control center aboard the Discoverer Inspiration in the Gulf of Mexico, which is remotely monitoring robots in the ocean below.
snippet: An image of the control center aboard the Discoverer Inspiration in the Gulf of Mexico, which is remotely monitoring robots in the ocean below.
lead_paragraph: Robots are playing an important role in trying to stop the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico. In this image, BP workers — known as robotic pilots — work with a remotely operated vehicle, or an R.O.V., on the Discoverer Inspiration ship in the Gulf of Mexico. They are remotely controlling the robot and trying to connect and test new caps on the runaway well in an effort to stop the gushing flow of oil.

headline.main: Bits Pics: Controlling the Robots Below
